pkgmetadata.longdescription: Parametric and Non-Parametric Demographic Functions and Applications // Calculate parametric mortality and Fertility models, following packages 'BaSTA' in Colchero, Jones and Rebke (2012) doi:10.1111/j.2041-210X.2012.00186.x and 'BaFTA' https://github.com/fercol/BaFTA, summary statistics (e.g. ageing rates, life expectancy, lifespan equality, etc.), life table and product limit estimators from census data.
